entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: WNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing in the morning and dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
